name: Virtuxy
description:
Virtuxy is a 3D puzzle game where you control two (2) robots, each with its own set of capabilities. Set in multiple beautiful and stylized environments, you use your logical thinking to help the robots find their lost friend. Combine the skills of each robot to solve puzzles, avoiding traps and enemies along the way!

  • Combination and collaboration as a way to overcome obstacles
  • Inspirational and energetic soundtrack
  • Environments with diverse and captivating themes
